TopicTitle: Trying to figure out how to transport a ship with code

Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm trying to change the orbit of a ship to a high orbit around Eve using the following code.

    double testHeight = FlightGlobals.Bodies[5].Radius + Convert.ToDouble(FlightGlobals.Bodies[5].maxAtmosphereAltitude) + 1000000;Orbit testOrb = new Orbit(0, 0, testHeight, 0, 0, 0, 0, FlightGlobals.Bodies[5]);FlightGlobals.ActiveVessel.orbitDriver.orbit = testOrb;

When I apply this as a module onto a stock part and then activate it via right-click menu while on the launchpad, it doesn't work, as shown in this screenshot with the debug menu:

![Pcflfn5.png](http://i.imgur.com/Pcflfn5.png)

Anyone can figure out what is wrong with my code?

Don't create a **new** orbit but edit the one already here. If you create a new one you will have some part of the code still using a ref to the old one.

And : [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111318-Teleport-active-vessel-to-another-vessel?p=1751139&viewfull=1#post1751139](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111318-Teleport-active-vessel-to-another-vessel?p=1751139&viewfull=1#post1751139)
Thanks, that example was exactly what I needed. I guess I should have used the search function first.
